qas.question: Which assets did the corporation begin to sell in 2013?
What was the value of the cancelled gas project that was to be contstructed in Louisiana?
The appointment of a new CEO in 2014 came prior to what announcement?

answers.text: the corporation's overall performance in 2013 was 38 per cent lower than 2012

qas.question: In what year did the corporation sell the majority of its Australian assets?
What was the value of assets the corporation planned to sell leading up to 2015?
How much was the 2013 sale of US shale gas assets worth?
Where did Shell begin selling US shale gas assets?
How much higher was the company's performance in 2013?
What is the worth of the Australian assets Shell sold in US dollars?

context: Over the course of 2013, the corporation began the sale of its <a0_0>US shale gas<a0_0/> assets and cancelled a <a1_0><b6_0>US$20 billion<b6_0/><a1_0/> gas project that was to be constructed in <b7_0>the US state of Louisiana<b7_0/>. A new CEO <b5_0>Ben van Beurden<b5_0/> was appointed in January 2014, prior to the announcement that <a2_0>the corporation's overall performance in 2013 was <b8_0>38 per cent<b8_0/> lower than 2012<a2_0/>—the value of Shell's shares fell by 3 per cent as a result. Following the sale of the majority of its Australian assets in February <a3_0>2014<a3_0/>, the corporation plans to sell a further <a4_0><b9_0>US$15 billion<b9_0/><a4_0/> worth of assets in the period leading up to 2015, with deals announced in Australia, Brazil and Italy.
